sqlMap.select: select REFERENCEDOCUMENT.*, CATEGORY.name as categoryName from REFERENCEDOCUMENT, CATEGORY where REFERENCEDOCUMENT.categoryId = CATEGORY.id order by title

select REFERENCEDOCUMENT.*, CATEGORY.name as categoryName from REFERENCEDOCUMENT, CATEGORY where REFERENCEDOCUMENT.categoryId = CATEGORY.id and REFERENCEDOCUMENT.deleted = 0 and CATEGORY.deleted = 0 order by CATEGORY.name, REFERENCEDOCUMENT.title
select * from REFERENCEDOCUMENT, CATEGORY WHERE REFERENCEDOCUMENT.DELETED = 0 AND CATEGORY.deleted = 0 AND REFERENCEDOCUMENT.categoryId = CATEGORY.id order by REFERENCEDOCUMENT.id desc LIMIT 11
select * from REFERENCEDOCUMENT, CATEGORY WHERE REFERENCEDOCUMENT.DELETED = 0 AND CATEGORY.deleted = 0 AND REFERENCEDOCUMENT.categoryId = CATEGORY.id order by REFERENCEDOCUMENT.id desc
select * from REFERENCEDOCUMENT WHERE deleted = 0 and categoryId = #id# order by title
sqlMap.update: update REFERENCEDOCUMENT set categoryId = #categoryId#, title = #title#, fileName = #fileName#, extension = #extension#, deleted = #deleted#, contentType = #contentType# where ID = #id#
update REFERENCEDOCUMENT set deleted = 1 where ID = #id#
